summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Face Cradle Cover - APPEARUS Massage Fitted Headrest Covers (6 Count/BD1005x6) Review Date: 2013/07/12 Store: APPEARUS Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'APPEARUS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Machine Wash', 'Package Dimensions': '11.9 x 4.2 x 1.2 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168357655'} Review Text: I purchased this cover January 17, 2011 when I started massage therapy school. I will also mention that when I made my purchase, it was sold as one cover for $8.50. It is a very long lasting cover! Not only did it survive 7 months of use in school, it has been part of my cover collection used for almost 2 years in my practice. It has been laundered and has held up beautifully - no rips, tears, fading or loss of softness. I am considering purchasing more now as my clientele has grown. With the current offer of $32 for a pack of 6, that makes each cover only a little over $5 each. With the track record the one I already have has, I am more than confident in purchasing more! Review Title: Lasts and Lasts Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CURECODE Neuromide Ampoule (30 ml), Concentrated Formula of Active Ingredients, Microbiome Science for Extremely Sensitive & Dry Skin, Repair and Protect Skin Barrier Function, Brightening and Firming for Mature Skin Types Review Date: 2021/01/19 Store: CURECODE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CURECODE', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 4.25 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': '40006'} Review Text: I got this CURECODE serum in hopes of introducing more moisture to my dry face (gotta love winter). The very first thing I noticed was that, while there are directions on the box, there are NO instructions on the bottle itself. I'm not in the habit of keeping the packaging (who does that?!).. they need to add the directions onto the bottle label!

The serum itself is pleasing. There was NO scent (THANK YOU!), my sensitive skin had no negative reactions at all and I was pleased with the thickness. It didn't completely absorb into my skin.. I had a few pieces of pillow lint (flannel sheets) stuck to my cheeks the next morning. I can't say how well it works long term yet, but I have high hopes as my skin was more supple the next am. I will update this review if I have any negative reactions. Review Title: Please put the directions on the bottle! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: French Girl Hibernation Essentials Review Date: 2021/02/05 Store: FRENCH GIRL Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FRENCH GIRL', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing,Hydrating', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.59 x 3.58 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '850000595255'} Review Text: The cuticle oil is so very hydrating. My cuticles (both on my feet and hands) are always dry and cracked and this oil really helped them not only look better but feel so much better! I appreciated the easy roll-on applicator too. The body lotion is a decent lotion. I wouldn't say it is earth-shattering or mind-blowing.. but it does smell really good and the scent isn't too overwhelming or powerful. My grandma is sensitive to powerful scents and she didn't turn her nose up at it so there's that. It is a decent thickness (not too runny or too thick), it absorbed relatively quickly and it makes my skin feel soft. The packaging is over the top, in a bad way. As a eco-minded person, the amount of packaging used was just ridiculous and unnecessary, IMO. My experience doesn't justify the price.. for the amounts you get and the average results are not equal to the price paid. Overall, this is a nice set and gift-worthy, but I probably won't purchase it again. Review Title: Decent products but over-priced and over-packaged Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: KYM NOVA Real Scrunchies for Hair, No Damage Hair Ties, Ponytail Holder Scrunchies, Assorted Scrunches Thick Hair Bands Red 5 pack Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: KYM NOVA Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'KYM NOVA', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '50 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.51 x 0.79 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '691206829757', 'Manufacturer': 'KYM NOVA'} Review Text: FINALLY!! Hair scrunchies that will not only hold my thick, medium length hair in a ponytail but will also STAY in my hair! I am so tired of scrunchies that fall out of my hair. Seriously. But I got these and they stay put! I am SO happy that I don't have to mess with a falling ponytail all the time anymore! The colors are very nice and the elastic is the best I've ever found in a scrunchie. I will be buying more in other colors!! Review Title: Got thick hair? Get these scrunchies!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Elasticity A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women and Men| Moisturizing Face Mask | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'A DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisturizing Layer,Moisturizing,Moisture', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} Review Text: Easy to use, my face was noticeably tighter the next morning and the price is right on point for the pack of 10 that you get. Add to that the scent is not overpowering and there was more than enough serum to get the job done. Thumbs up! Review Title: These are very nice masks that do exactly what they claim. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Klavuu Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack- Overnight Exfoliating & Nourishing Lip Treatment Balm for Dry Lips - Natural Moisturizing Lip Oil with Vanilla Flavor - Lip Balm to Repair & Protect Lips 0.7oz. Review Date: 2021/04/19 Store: KLAVUU Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'KLAVUU', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Nourishing', 'Flavor': 'Vanilla', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Lip Sleeping Pack', 'UPC': '762539926977'} Review Text: I got this KLAVUU Nourishing Care Lip Sleeping Pack and have been using it nightly for a few weeks now. I have found that it is tasteless, odorless and does give me very soft lips by the next morning. However, it is extremely thick and sticky and it doesn't absorb very well. I apply it right before bed and no matter how careful I am to apply a very small amount I always need to use a tissue to dab the excess off so my lips don't stick to my pillowcase and so lint isn't attracted to and stick to my lips while I sleep. So, even though I have soft lips in the A.M., this is a pass for me. Review Title: Gives soft lips but doesn't absorb well Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 8PC Lazy Bird's Nest Plate Hairpin Velvet Bird Nest Shaped Hair Clips Expandable Ponytail Holder Hair Loops Nest Plate Hairpin Hair Claw Clip barrette Review Date: 2022/07/10 Store: AhkeaDirectly Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AhkeaDirectly', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Resin', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.02 x 5.2 x 2.32 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '761312153890'} Review Text: I have very thick hair and when these arrived I attempted to use it to finish a bun. Nope. Thick hair weighs a LOT and this bird nest hair clip just adds more weight and since my bun isn't on top of my head, the clip's weight pushes my bun off the back of my head. I had high hopes for these cute clips, but unfortunately they are a no go for me. I've donated them to my local women's shelter. Review Title: Not for thick hair Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Not for thick hair Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of this purchase history reveals a consumer with a strong preference for practicality, durability, and effectiveness in personal care and beauty products. The individual repeatedly prioritizes products that cater to sensitive skin and dry conditions, indicating an inclination towards items designed for moisture retention and repair. This is evident from the consistent selection of hydrating and moisturizing solutions in their skincare routine.

The consumer demonstrates a critical approach towards product packaging and pricing, often expressing concerns about excessive packaging and perceived value versus price. Despite a willingness to invest in products that deliver long-term benefits, they remain hesitant when initial experiences do not meet expectations, as shown by the varied ratings.

Quality is paramount, with a notable bias towards high-rated items, especially those with good customer feedback regarding ease of use and effectiveness. However, dissatisfaction arises with products that fail to perform as expected, particularly when they are overpriced or inadequately designed for thicker hair.

Overall, this individual values high-quality, considerate design, and reliable performance in beauty and personal care products while maintaining sensitivity to pricing and packaging choices.

target_interaction.title: Not for thick hair
target_interaction.text: Try as I might, these clips simply would not stay in my thick hair. They kept slipping and falling out. They are weak and have no grip whatsoever. Others with thinner or finer hair may have better results.
target_interaction.title_meta: 1PCS Sparkling Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clips, Braided Hair Clips for Women, Rhinestone Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Flower Hair Clip with 3 Small Clips, Hair Barrettes for Women Girls Styling

videos.title: Sparkling Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clips
8PCS rsvelte sparkling crystal stone braided hair clips
